Posts.Content: kaiselina wrote: Hi everyone.  I'm 26 years old and I went to the doctor today to get a physical.  My doctor felt a lump but it could be that I'm getting my period soon.  She said that I need to come back in 3 months for another checkup.  I don't want to wait 3 months though.  Should I check with another doctor?  I want to know how old can you get breast cancer?  Should I be worried?   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How old can you get breast cancer? kaiselina miss-di

Posts.Content: Dec 29, 2008 06:35PM kaiselina wrote: Thanks Maryannecb.  I'm glad to hear that having bc at my age is rare but it can happen.  I'm crossing my fingers.
Posts.Title: How old can you get breast cancer? kaiselina miss-di

Posts.Content: Dec 29, 2008 06:32PM kaiselina wrote: Thanks Beesie, your advice helps out a lot.  My doctor says to wait 3 months, others say I should get it checked out sooner if I am worried.  My doctor says that it could be fibrocystic, just like what you had.  Are you experiencing anything else? Are you free from fibrocystic or can it come back again?
Posts.Title: How old can you get breast cancer? kaiselina miss-di

Posts.Content: Dec 29, 2008 06:13PM kaiselina wrote: Hi Mommy3abm and Nancy.  I called my doctor today to ask her if I can see her sooner.  I'm waiting for her call.  My family does not have a history of breast cancer.  Nancy, if your lump disappeared, are you experiencing any more lumps?
